name: fire-fang
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or sustain a burn.
flavor_text.platinum: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or sustain a burn.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or sustain a burn.
